text: le’inezīya yanini inesu zenidi betewiratina be’īnijīli tets’ifo yemīyagenyutini yemayits’ifina yemayanebi nebīyi yeẖonewini melikitenya yemīketelu leẖonuti (be’irigit’i its’ifiletalehu)፡፡ bebego šira yazachewali፡፡ kekifumi negeri yikelekilachewali፡፡ melikami negerochinimi lenerisu yifek’idilachewali፡፡ met’ifo negerochinimi be’inerisu layi irimi yaderigibachewali፡፡ ke’inesumi layi shekimachewinina inezīyanimi be’inerisu layi yeneberutini inizazilawochi (kebadi ḥigigatochi) yanesalachewali፡፡ inezīyami be’irisu yamenu yakeberutimi yeredutimi yaninimi ke’irisu gari yeteweredewini birihani yeteketelu inezīya inesu yemīyadinu nachewi፡፡
